------------ Game Setup ------------
supply cards: Secret Chamber, Haven, Loan, Pirate Ship, Explorer, Outpost, Treasury, Venture, Mountebank, Harem, Copper, Silver, Gold, Curse, Estate, Duchy, Province
DG - starting cards: Estate, Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
Lord Bottington - starting cards: Estate, Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
DG - shuffles deck
Lord Bottington - shuffles deck
DG - draws Copper, Estate, Estate, Copper, Estate
Lord Bottington - draws Copper, Copper, Estate, Copper, Copper
 
---------- Lord Bottington: turn 1 ----------
Lord Bottington - plays 4 Copper
Lord Bottington - gains Silver
Lord Bottington - draws Estate, Copper, Copper, Estate, Copper
 
---------- DG: turn 1 ----------
 
------------ Game Over ------------
DG - cards: 7 Copper, 3 Estate
DG - victory point chips: 0
DG - total victory points: 3
Lord Bottington - cards: 7 Copper, 1 Silver, 3 Estate
Lord Bottington - victory point chips: 0
Lord Bottington - total victory points: 3
